name: Documentation Standards
description: Rules for code documentation, project documentation, and comment quality

rules.name: Code Documentation
guidelines: Document all public functions and classes

rules.name: Project Documentation
guidelines: Maintain up-to-date README files for all major components
Keep API documentation synchronized with implementation
Use diagrams for visualizing complex systems

rules.name: Comment Quality
guidelines: Focus comments on why, not what
Update comments when changing the related code
Use TODO comments with issue references for future work
